Myo Tasker Plugin Done Add Myo Gesture Done Fist Thumb-to-Pinky Wave In Wave Out Fingers Spread You must select a pose! Settings Disable this option to prevent Toasts when the Myo detects a new gesture Show Gesture Toasts Myo connected Connect to Myo Myo Status Notification If enabled, a notification will be shown at all times that shows the status of the Myo. Disconnected from Myo Myo is attached Myo is detached Please perform the setup gesture with the Myo Last gesture: Relock Time The time that your Myo will detect gestures after the unlock gesture is performed Last connected to: Detached Myo:
Welcome to Myo Tasker Plugin!\n\nTo get started with your Myo, touch your Myo to the phone and wait for the \'Myo connected\' message to appear. Open up Tasker and add a new profile of the \'Event\' type. The plugin will show under the \'Plugins\' category as \'Add Myo Gesture\'.\n\n Myo gestures will only be recognized after you perform the unlock gesture (pinky-to-thumb). By default you have 5 seconds to perform your next gesture before you must use the unlock gesture again (this time is configurable in Settings.\n\n\nPlease contact the developer with any questions. Enjoy! Double Tap Disconnect from Myo r
